titleStmt.title: A treatise concernynge the diuision betwene the spirytualtie and temporaltie
titleStmt.author: Saint German, Christopher, 1460?-1540.

publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete next to sayncte Dunstones churche, by Robert Redman,
